holidays.title: International Olympic Day
holidays.description: The most important thing in the Olympics is not winning, but taking part in it.

holidays.title: International Widows' Day
holidays.description: On this International Widows Day, let us commit to giving the support widows need.

holidays.title: International Women in Engineering Day
holidays.description: Today’s a great day to celebrate the women in STEM even more than we usually do.

holidays.title: Jura Independence Day
holidays.description: Buckle up! It’s time to learn about freedom and independence this Jura Independence Day!

holidays.title: Let it Go Day
holidays.description: “Don’t ruin a new day by thinking about yesterday. Let it go.”

holidays.title: Luxembourg National Day
holidays.description: Let's get ready to celebrate the Grand Duke/Duchess of Luxembourg's official birthday!

holidays.title: National Detroit Style Pizza Day
holidays.description: Get ready, we’re going to the birthplace of the American automobile and Motown!

holidays.title: National Family Owned & Operated Businesses Day
holidays.description: Find out why family businesses are invaluable to the economy and often have a long history.

holidays.title: National Fatherless Children’s Day
holidays.description: Join us in raising awareness about the detrimental effects that fatherless children face around the world.

holidays.title: National Hydration Day
holidays.description: Proper hydration is vital to living a healthy life, but it’s often overlooked.

holidays.title: National Pecan Sandies Day
holidays.description: Cookies make everything infinitely better, so we guarantee pecan sandies will have you coming back for more.

holidays.title: National Pink Day
holidays.description: “Whoever said orange is the new pink is seriously disturbed!”

holidays.title: National Typewriter Day
holidays.description: We’re using the day to celebrate the written word!

holidays.title: Pentecost Orthodox
holidays.description: Pentecost Orthodox is celebrated fifty days after Easter in the Orthodox Church.

holidays.title: Pink Flamingo Day
holidays.description: Find out why many homeowners love decorating their gardens with these quirky pink ornaments.

holidays.title: United Nations Public Service Day
holidays.description: Emphasize the public service contribution to the development process and recognize the work of public servants.

holidays.title: Victory Day Estonia
holidays.description: The beautiful country had to fight many wars before it became free and happy.

holidays.title: Brawadis’s Birthday
holidays.description: The whole Awadis family is on social media, but Brawadis is undoubtedly the most popular of all.

holidays.title: Casey Frey’s Birthday
holidays.description: Casey Frey is filled with enough energy to make us laugh for many years to come.

holidays.title: Johannes Gutenberg’s Birthday
holidays.description: Attempt after attempt, Johannes Gutenberg made the greatest invention known to man.

holidays.title: Lilliana Ketchman’s Birthday
holidays.description: If dancing is an art, Lilliana Ketchman is the Mona Lisa.
